sentence.Network_en: Russian speaking guides are available on: Tuesdays and Fridays.
sentence.Network_cn: 讲俄语导游可在: 星期二和星期五.

sentence.Network_en: The east, part of the Russian empire for centuries, is largely Orthodox and Russian - speaking.
sentence.Network_cn: 几个世纪以来,乌克兰东部都是大俄帝国的一部分, 那里居住的大多也都是正统的说俄语的人民.

sentence.Network_en: They will foment trouble in all three Baltic republics, where there are large Russian - speaking minorities.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们将在所有三个波罗的海共和国挑起争端, 那里有大批讲俄语的少数民族.
